text: Bactriola maculata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Martins and Galileo in 1992. It is known from Ecuador and Venezuela.BioLib.cz - Bactriola maculata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1992
title: Bactriola maculata
